explanation: The code failed to print anything when cnt == 3 but t was not a rotation of s. The outer elif consumed that case so the final else (which prints "No") did not run, leaving no output. I fixed this by changing the elif line so it only becomes true when cnt == 3 AND t is in s+s; then the final else will handle the cnt==3 but non-rotation case and print "No". This change fixes the missing-output bug and only modifies one line.
